folder_setup.title: Step 1: Create a Google Drive folder
folder_setup.intro: grAIde needs a shared folder where you'll upload test photos from your phone.

instructions.title: Here's how to create it:
instructions.step1: Open Google Drive on your computer
instructions.step3: Right-click the folder → Share → Copy link

validation.invalid: This doesn't look like a valid Google Drive folder link

confirmation.title: All set!
confirmation.message: grAIde is ready to use. You can now:

features.upload: Upload test photos to your Drive folder
features.organize: Sort them in the Photo Inbox
